00015 #include <memory>

00018 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00019 
00020 class request;
00021 
00022 class completion_handler_impl
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     virtual void operator() (request * ) = 0;
00026     virtual completion_handler_impl * clone() const = 0;
00027     virtual ~completion_handler_impl() { }
00028 };
00029 
00031 
00040 class completion_handler
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     completion_handler() : sp_impl_(0) { }
00044     completion_handler(const completion_handler & obj) : sp_impl_(obj.sp_impl_.get()->clone()) { }
00045     completion_handler & operator = (const completion_handler & obj)
00046     {
00047         completion_handler copy(obj);
00048         completion_handler_impl * p = sp_impl_.release();
00049         sp_impl_.reset(copy.sp_impl_.release());
00050         copy.sp_impl_.reset(p);
00051         return *this;
00052     }
00053     void operator() (request * req)
00054     {
00055         (*sp_impl_)(req);
00056     }
00057     template <typename handler_type>
00058     completion_handler(const handler_type & handler__);
00059 private:
00060     std::auto_ptr<completion_handler_impl> sp_impl_;
00061 };
00062 
00063 template <typename handler_type>
00064 class completion_handler1 : public completion_handler_impl
00065 {
00066 private:
00067     handler_type handler_;
00068 public:
00069     completion_handler1(const handler_type & handler__) : handler_(handler__) { }
00070     completion_handler1 * clone() const
00071     {
00072         return new completion_handler1(*this);
00073     }
00074     void operator() (request * req)
00075     {
00076         handler_(req);
00077     }
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename handler_type>
00081 completion_handler::completion_handler(const handler_type & handler__) :
00082     sp_impl_(new completion_handler1<handler_type>(handler__))
00083 { }
00084
